attributes.action: Post Office & Royal Mail Together & Services
attributes.additional_details:
UK Post Office & Royal Mail need to be kept together. They have worked hand in hand for since they were founded. All services that have been withdrawn past present should be returned to the Post Office. National Savings & Investment and Green Giro are being removed from Post Office. Make all banks come online all services at the Post Office.

Keep the Great British Publicly Owned Postal Service together and reintroduce all services withdrawn. The network is viable if you leave it how it was. 11500 branches biggest network of all major banks put together locally. Even though it has half the about of branches to 7 years ago.

This Goverment has committed to making the Post Office the one stop shop for Goverment Services but are awarding contracts to the Post Office Rivals.

SAVE THE POST OFFICE & ROYAL MAIL NETWORK PUBLICLY OWNED
